citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
The following expired medications were identified during the inspection:
One bottle of Cefazolin with an expiration date of 2/16;
One bottle of Solumedrol with an expiration date of 2/13.
The use of expired medications is not considered adequate veterinary care. The facility needs to ensure that all
medications in the regulated animal areas are within date.
*****Correct from this point forward
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.
